amendment.description: Page 47, after line 2, insert the following new section: ? SEC. 503. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for Juniata Ultra Low Emission Locomotive Demonstration, PA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being made available for Juniata Ultra Low Emission Locomotive Demonstration, PA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 46 - 372 (Roll no. 205).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
